hero.subtitle: Since 2023, we've evolved from game key sales to software development, then to cloud gaming. By late 2025, with €2.5M raised, VMCloud structures this expertise to conquer the European market from Estonia.

timeline.title: From Hackboot to VMCloud
timeline.subtitle: The evolution from a gaming vision to complete cloud infrastructure

legal.title: Legal Framework & Compliance
legal.subtitle: Operating from Estonia with full compliance

estonia.title: Estonian Jurisdiction
estonia.content: In Estonia, the development and use of game modifications (cheats) are entirely legal. This jurisdiction allows us to innovate freely while respecting European regulations.

expansion.title: European Expansion
expansion.content: Our Estonian structure provides an ideal framework for European expansion. We adapt our services to each market while maintaining operational excellence.

legal.note.content: VMCloud operates in full transparency with Estonian and European authorities. Our gaming activity, including cheat development, is declared and compliant with local legislation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: Create the best European cloud infrastructure by and for enthusiasts. We believe that by combining technical excellence and authentic passion, we can offer uncompromising solutions. Business and passion are not incompatible: we want to succeed financially while staying true to our values.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Unleash the potential of every project by providing limitless infrastructure. Give our customers and teams all the tools they need to achieve their ambitions. Be transparent, open and always listening. Enable everyone to build what they want, how they want.

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.subtitle: A unique corporate philosophy, inspired by tech world best practices

talent.title: Talent & Feeling
talent.content: We recruit on talent AND feeling. Technical skills are essential, but shared vision and human chemistry are equally important. If you don't feel the passion, it won't work.

freedom.title: Total Freedom
freedom.content: Work how you want, where you want, when you want. No micro-management, no corporate bullshit. We believe in autonomy and responsibility. Results speak for themselves.

passion.title: Passion First
passion.content: Yes, we're a business and we want to succeed financially. But we're first and foremost enthusiasts who want to build the best possible solutions. Excellence is non-negotiable.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content: We believe in a flat organization where everyone can take initiative, inspired by innovative tech company models. No rigid hierarchy, no corporate politics. Just talented people working together on exciting projects.

gaylor.name: Gaylor Loche
gaylor.bio: Founder of DVP Holding, entrepreneur and AI consultant. Strategic vision and business expertise.

julien.name: Julien Larmanaud
julien.bio: Ex-AWS senior engineer. Expert in GPU computing and high-performance cloud infrastructure.

gengis.name: Gengis Lahoui
gengis.bio: Ex-O2Switch ML/GenAI engineer. Expert in development and architecture of complex systems.

cta.title: Ready to build the future?

hackbootCreation.title: Creation of Hackboot
hackbootCreation.description: Started with competitive game key sales. Building first customer base and understanding the gaming market.

softwareDev.title: Software Development
softwareDev.description: Pivot to custom software development. Creating tools and applications for the gaming community.

cloudGaming.title: Cloud Gaming & Cheats
cloudGaming.description: Launch of cloud gaming and legal cheat development in Estonia. Deep technical expertise in GPU optimization.

vmcloudBirth.title: Birth of VMCloud
vmcloudBirth.description: €2.5M raised with OVHCloud and SEB Pank. Company structuring and transformation into VMCloud for the European market.

rapidExpansion.title: Rapid Expansion
rapidExpansion.description: Acquiring thousands of customers, European expansion from Estonia. Enterprise infrastructure deployed in 3 major datacenters.

innovation.title: Innovation & Growth
innovation.description: Consolidating achievements, adding innovative new services. New datacenters planned for Madrid and Milan. AI solutions development.

hero.subtitle: Launched in September 2025, VMCloud revolutionizes cloud hosting with an innovative approach to high-performance infrastructure.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: VMCloud was founded in September 2025 with a clear vision: democratize access to enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure. Our team, composed of experts from Europe's leading tech companies, identified a crucial market need: performant, transparent, and accessible cloud solutions.
story.p2: From our launch, we attracted major investors' attention. OVHCloud, the European cloud leader, immediately recognized our potential and became our strategic partner and principal investor. This collaboration allows us to benefit from their expertise while maintaining our agility and innovation capacity.
story.p3: SEB Pank, one of the leading Baltic banks, also supports us as an investor and financial partner, enabling us to offer innovative and secure payment solutions to our European clients.

ovh.desc: European cloud computing leader, OVHCloud brings us their technical expertise and global infrastructure network.

seb.desc: Major banking institution in the Baltic countries, SEB Pank facilitates our financial operations and European expansion.

amd.desc: Privileged access to the latest EPYC processors and direct technical support to optimize our performance.

nvidia.desc: Partner program for priority access to Tesla and RTX GPUs for our AI and gaming solutions.

equinix.desc: Presence in Equinix datacenters for optimal global connectivity.

cloudflare.desc: Enterprise DDoS protection and global CDN network for our clients.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: Become the European leader in next-generation cloud infrastructure by combining exceptional performance, total transparency, and constant innovation. We want every developer and company to access world-class infrastructure without complexity or hidden costs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Provide ultra-performant, simple, and transparent cloud infrastructure. We eliminate technical complexity so our clients can focus on their core business, with the guarantee of maximum performance and reliability.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Cutting-edge technologies and constant innovation to stay ahead

security.title: Security
security.description: Maximum protection with end-to-end encryption and full compliance

support.title: Support
support.description: Expert team available 24/7 to assist you

deposit.title: Refundable deposit
deposit.description: €900 deposit for pay-as-you-go billing. At the end of the month, you only pay for your actual usage and the rest is refunded.
deposit.firstMonth: Applied only during the first month of registration.

configurator.title: Configure
configurator.subtitle: Choose your billing plan and proceed to payment

payment.title: Payment information
payment.secure: Secure payment compliant with PCI DSS 2025 standards
payment.hourlyNote: Actual billing will be based on your usage
payment.legal: By proceeding with payment, you accept our terms of service and privacy policy. In accordance with 2025 European regulations, your payment data is encrypted and secured according to PCI DSS v4.0 standards. No banking data is stored on our servers.

error.temporary: Service temporarily unavailable. Our team has been notified.

hero.subtitle: Join our passionate team building next-generation cloud solutions. Remote-first, no bullshit, just pure tech excellence.

why.title: Why VMCloud?
why.subtitle: We're not just another cloud company. We're building something special.

remote.title: Remote First
remote.description: Work from anywhere in the world

positions.title: Open Positions
positions.subtitle: Ready to join the adventure? Check out our current openings.

senior_devops.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
senior_devops.description: Build and maintain our cloud infrastructure at scale. Work with cutting-edge technologies and shape our technical architecture.

backend_engineer.title: Backend Engineer
backend_engineer.description: Develop robust APIs and services that power our cloud platform. Focus on performance, scalability, and reliability.

gpu_specialist.title: GPU Infrastructure Specialist
gpu_specialist.description: Optimize GPU workloads for gaming and AI. Work on cutting-edge cloud gaming and machine learning infrastructure.

security_engineer.title: Security Engineer
security_engineer.description: Secure our infrastructure and protect customer data. Implement security best practices and ensure compliance.

spontaneous.text: Don't see a perfect match? We're always looking for exceptional talents.

innovation.title: Innovation Without Limits
innovation.content: We encourage crazy ideas. The best innovations come from thinking differently. If you have an idea, we'll give you the resources to test it.

remote.title: Remote by Design
remote.content: We've been remote since day one. No return to office, no hybrid bullshit. Work from your couch, a beach, or a mountain. We don't care as long as you deliver.

passion.title: Passion First
passion.content: We're not here just for a paycheck. We're building something we believe in. If you're not passionate about what we do, this isn't the place for you.

cta.title: Ready to Join?
cta.subtitle: Take the next step in your career with VMCloud
